Section.Catchline: Power of special taxing district to appropriate proceeds from sale or lease of hospital or health care system to economic development trust fund.

SectionBody.Text: Notwithstanding any other general or special law, the purposes for which a special taxing district may appropriate funds from the sale or lease of a hospital or health care system to an economic development fund include the promotion and support of economic growth in such district and in the county in which such district is located and the furthering of the purposes of such district, as provided by law.
